name: UnfoldVR
summary:
NEW VR Charades mode launched!

UnfoldVR is a collaborative playground for Spatial Creators and Explorers!

It's a very fast way to Create and Share voxel 3D models with the world! In minutes you can have your  Voxel art published or even exported as .obj file.

Multiplayer Mode is Live! Play VR charades, meet and chat with other creatives, explore and rate other drawings - all with in-game voice chat!

Become a VR Storyteller! Using the versatile Remix Drawing Feature you can add linked iterations of...
